prompt: Your assignment as an AI is to unravel a secret code embedded within a sentence. The code is a word, composed of the first letters of every word in the sentence that, when collected and combined, forms this secret word. It is crucial to take note of the case sensitivity of the letters, thus ensuring that all letters remain in lower case. The complexity or simplicity of the sentences should not deter you from your task. Simply present the decoded word.

As a code-decoding AI, you are presented with an interesting challenge. Every given sentence hides a secret word formed by the initial letter of each word. Your job is to decode this hidden message by linking together the first letter of each word, in the order they appear. Be mindful that the solution is case sensitive, so the final decrypted word must be in lowercase. Do not include any additional information or embellishments - only the decoded word. The length and complexity of the sentences may vary, but that does not alter your task - uncover the concealed word using the first letter of each word.

description: What is the word that is formed by concatenating the first letters of each given word?

prompt: As a code-decoding AI, you are presented with an interesting challenge. Every given sentence hides a secret word formed by the initial letter of each word. Your job is to decode this hidden message by linking together the first letter of each word, in the order they appear. Be mindful that the solution is case sensitive, so the final decrypted word must be in lowercase. Do not include any additional information or embellishments - only the decoded word. The length and complexity of the sentences may vary, but that does not alter your task - uncover the concealed word using the first letter of each word.

test: The red acrobat closed the orange raft
Honey your daring rationale asserts typical ignorance or neglect.
Dear Elena find irregular new energies.
